data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Eastern Equatoria to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Eastern Equatoria, South Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Eastern Equatoria, South Sudan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Eastern Equatoria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Eastern Equatoria. Through your servants plant 18 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Arab, Sudanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Sudanese people know you.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Eastern Equatoria to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,307 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 10,307 believers in Eastern Equatoria, South Sudan who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
